original: Johansson, Sven Christian, professor, överläkare, Göteborg, f. 30/1/80 i Karlshamn av Peter Johan J. o. Hilda Charlotta Petersson. G. 24 m. Betzie Bergman. — Mog:ex. i Karlskrona 97, med. kand. i Lund 02 o. med. lic. där 07, med. dr i Sthlm 24. Stud:resa t. Österr. o. Tyskl. 09-10. Ett flert. förordn. s. aman. v. inst. o. kir. klin. i Lund 99-06, aman. o. und:-läk. v. Sabbatsb. sjukh. kir. avd. 08 o. 10-12, aman. v. gynekol. avd. där 10, ett flert. förordn. s. las :läk. på olika platser 09-12, und :läk. v. Maria sjukh. 13-14, överläk. v. Gbgs barn-sjukh. kir. avd. 24, överläk. där 26-45, prof. namn 36. Led. av stadsfullm. i Gbg 19-22, ordf. i Gbgs hälsovmd 20-30, ordf. i direkt, f. Styrsö barnsjukh. GV:sJmt, KN02kl, KV02kl, LVVS.
translated: Johansson, Sven Christian, professor, chief physician, Gothenburg, born January 30, 1880 in Karlshamn to Peter Johan J. and Hilda Charlotta Petersson. Married on June 24 to Betzie Bergman. Completed medical degree and licensure in Lund in 1902 and 1907 respectively, and received doctorate in Stockholm in 1924. Went on study trips to Austria and Germany from 1909 to 1910. Held several positions as an assistant lecturer at institutes and surgical clinics in Lund from 1899 to 1906, as well as assistant and primary physician positions at various hospitals from 1908 to 1912, and senior physician positions at Maria Hospital from 1913 to 1914. Became head of the pediatric surgical department at Gothenburg Children's Hospital in 1924, then chief physician from 1926 to 1945, and professor in 1936. Was a member of the Gothenburg City Council from 1919 to 1922, chairman of the Gothenburg Board of Health from 1920 to 1930, chairman of the board of directors for Styrsö Children's Hospital, and received the GV:sJmt, KN02kl, KV02kl, and LVVS honors.

memberOf.name: Styrsö Children's Hospital
memberOf.position: Chairman of the Board of Directors

award.name: Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star (KN02kl)
Knight of the Order of the Sword (KV02kl)
Large Gold Medal for Swedes Abroad (LVVS)
